body.h2: This page is a work in progress.
body.p: Above is (probably) a console, and below is possibly disfunctional or unstyled content. Whatever happens, things will not look right.
For now, don't follow any instructions below about debugging. I don't need it. They're only there as the default texts in the future case that the scripts for those should work, but don't.

blockquote.p: Some links don't look quite right when you hover over them. I'll figure out how I wanna style those eventually.
Also, the todo list doesn't work yet. Ignore that.
